Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a solution that can revolutionize your business operations and elevate your company to new heights. Given its exceptional capabilities and the value it can bring to your organization, I am extending an exclusive offer to you.

I propose to sell this product to you for $1200000. This price reflects a strategic discount that acknowledges your early interest and commitment to innovation within your industry. By accepting this offer, you will gain access to unparalleled features and benefits that are tailored to enhance productivity, efficiency, and profitability.

Please consider this offer carefully. I am confident that our product will exceed your expectations and contribute significantly to the growth of your business. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you every step of the way.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
